channel.title: Need help with compiler please!
channel.description: i need help with compiler... i have java version jdk kit 6 and the source is pimpscape

item.title: Need help with compiler please!
item.dc:creator: @Haiku01 Haiku01
item.description:
@Haiku01 wrote:

use my own coded compiler

[code]@echo off
COLOR 4
TITLE Menu

:menu
CLS
ECHO Server menu
ECHO The ULTIMATE MENU
ECHO.
ECHO Type 1 to compile and run!
ECHO Type 2 to run!
ECHO Type 3 to compile!
ECHO Type 4 to Exit!
SET option=
ECHO.
SET /p option=Your Choice?
if %option%==1 goto compileandrunserver
if %option%==2 goto runserver
if %option%==3 goto compileserver
if %option%==4 exi
echo Please select a color to change the text to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color:
if %back%== black (set t=0)
if %back%== white (set t=7)
if %back%== red (set t=4)
if %back%== yellow (set t=6)
if %back%== green (set t=2)
if %back%== blue (set t=1)
if %back%== purple (set t=5)
goto co2
:compileandrunserver
CLS
title MF-PARADISE is compiling…
echo Compiling MF-PARADISE…
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
title Started MF-PARADISE…
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo Compiling MF-PARADISE. Complete…
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo Loading MF-PARADISE. Complete…
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo MF-PARADISE is fully compiled and loaded!
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
CLS
exit

:runserver
CLS
TITLE Started MF-PARADISE
ECHO MF-PARADISE is being started…
ECHO ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
CLS

:compileserver
CLS
title MF-PARADISE compiling…
echo Compiling MF-PARADISE…
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
echo Compiling complete…
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo.
echo.
echo Type 1 to run the server!
echo Type 2 to go to the menu!
echo Type 3 to exit!
echo.
SET optioncompile=
SET /p optioncompile=What do you want to do now?
if %optioncompile%==1 goto runserver
if %optioncompile%==2 goto menu
if %optioncompile%==3 exit[/code]

you can edit it I won’t mind[br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2007, 07:52:18 AM[/size][hr]g2g guys cya
